name: A spell to live for
description:
In an unknown land, in a distant place
Lived a wizard, peace and content in soul

Surrounded by bees, trees, lady nature's grace
Such a scenery called for a sweet little stroll

In their quest for exploration, wonder
Their stomach suddenly called for hunger

The forest was filled with great ingredients
"Exploring further should be convenient!"

With an empty belly and a wavering mind
Our hero was now lost for certain

With nothing in hand, and their home to find
The Wizard was ready ! Let's open this curtain...


In this platformer, you can go left, right, and jump

Use your keyboard to play

A = to go left

D = to go right

Space = to jump

Spam space  = to climb the big plant

Hold middle mouse button = place a respawn

The water might be useful to grow a seed...

You wont be able to get to your cosy home without dying, use your middleclick to create a sigil so you can come back safely to life.


TechDivers : Code

FrancisRave : Music/SFX & Text

Tori: Art

This game was made during the Wovie game jam 3.0 - from 26.02 to 01.03
The theme was : Failure is progress
